item.description:
Flyby News & The Awareness Initiative

present:

Dark Legacy - JFK & 9-11

(58 minutes running time)

+

THRIVE

Remix (and edit) by Chris Pratt

Entitled: CHOOSE

(Up to 30 minutes running time)

The above link will take you to

Questions of Conscience

independent media

 


Dark Legacy - JFK and 9-11 - (short version) – 58 minutes

New film captures the spirit of conspiracies while facing reality.

Produced by Flyby News at Greenfield Community Television

Contact: Jonathan Mark; Email noflyby AT yahoo.com – www.FlybyNews.com

Dark Legacy - JFK and 9-11 is a film compilation with music that tackles four major conspiracies of our times: the JFK assassination, Federal Reserve, Apollo Lunar Missions, and 9-11. Once you break through into an evidence-based reality in any of these conspiracies, identifying a cover-up becomes obvious. It is only spin that keeps many lurking in the shadows of truth, meanwhile the system is closing in on itself. November 22, 2013 will mark 50 years since the assassination of President Kennedy. Watching the clips from John Hankey's film: "Dark Legacy: George Bush and the Murder of John F. Kennedy," one can gain insight on what his assassination meant to our world. The new 58 minute film, which concentrates the original (almost two and a half hour) version, begins with JFK, then goes back and forth to the Federal Reserve and evidence of a moon landing hoax. There is also a music video with Steppenwolf, "Monster", following that is a clip on the National Citizens' Initiative for Democracy. This could be the best plan to provide power to the people, and for democracy. Part two in this version covers the events of September 11 in Chile and in the US.

Flyby News has been in the foreground of progressive news since taking on the military industrial complex in a campaign to stop nuclear power and weapons from entering outer space. It was soon after the events of September 11, 2001 that President Bush terminated the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty, which enabled offensive weapons to be placed over our heads. The events of September 11 were also used to engage in wars, and with the stated purpose for 'homeland security', we lost many of our civil and human liberties. Why? The evidence shows a trail going back for Centuries to promote a world empire for elites, controlling energy resources, currencies, and for military world domination. The problem is that this sought of policy creates the lowest standard for human survival even through this Century. Everything is out of sought, and being normal is being programmed and controlled by fear. Fear can be subtle. You may convince yourself that you are not controlled by fear, but meanwhile a monster is on the loose. Awakening to 'what is' is key for dealing with our current crises and reality.

Jonathan Mark is offering a free DVD to anyone wanting to review it to broadcast at their local community access television station. He encourages people to burn copies to share with family and friends in 'fair use' since it does use copyright protected material. Flyby News' fair use policy is posted near the bottom at FlybyNews.com

 

 

CHOOSE -  Complementing this video recompilation and remix is a hybrid of the Thrive movie and a remix called “Choose.” Choose begs the question Global Domination or Global Consciousness? It is being released in concert with a magazine called QC (Questions of Conscience) and a TV series for PEG TV called “Lies and Liars”. Episode 1 of this series has already played to well over 1 million households.Episode 2 will be released in January along with QCmagazine.


THRIVE is an unconventional documentary that lifts the veil on what's REALLY going on in our world by following the money upstream -- uncovering the global consolidation of power in nearly every aspect of our lives. Weaving together breakthroughs in science, consciousness and activism, THRIVE offers real solutions, empowering us with unprecedented and bold strategies for reclaiming our lives and our future.

 

Join discussions following films

 

It is possible we could begin the event earlier, anytime after 5pm if we want to do anything with food or in the media community room.

 

The following is from Flyby News

regarding the the full version of
